-- Megatron >> ? --

Megatron feels himself being drawn into the vortex of swirling 
condensed energy that was released from the crystal and combined 
with his plasma cannon's charged blast. Both physical forms having 
disappeared, and the new shell forming, Megatron's spark truely 
feels fear. He wonders whether this is going to end up as his last 
fight... and he is ultimately surprised to find out that he senses 
vaguely the same thoughts coming from Galvatron.

Now structure of the new body was beginning to take shape. Powerful 
legs, arms, and torso developed themselves. Two sleek dragon-like 
heads began to sprout from equal distances on the top of the torso 
between his central head. A wire covered form of a new bot was 
barely visible inside the fluctuating energon sphere.

Once the critical layer had been completed, the outer shell began 
forming. Sharp talons hardened on his feet and on his hands. 
Starting on his feet, dark scales begin to appear being created in 
sucession as they creep up his legs and onto the rest of his body. 
Each scale changes colour from the top to the bottom of it. The top 
of the scale is black, then its colour slowly changes into blood red 
at the bottom leaving his entire robot form looking heavily 
armoured, sleek and dangerous.

His powerful hands are black, and has jagged claws which protrude a 
bit from each finger joint like small claws. The blood red scale 
ends make it look like he's always just punched something organic. 
The large dragon bot's feet resemble the rest of his scaled body, 
except that their tips are sharpened points. Effective beast mode 
combat weapons. His head has a moderately sized crown on top, and 
blood red linked scale streaks that start just between his eyes, 
curve up over his eyes and flow backwards along the side of his head 
and stop just past the back of head, giving him an exceptionally 
evil look. His face below the blood red scale streaks, is covered 
with a layer of smaller scales which seem to flow from the start of 
the streaks down below his eyes, and off behind his head always 
below the scale streaks. 

On his back, two large wings frames begins forming. A lighter 
elastic web-like version of the scales forms along the wing 
skeleton. The wings become enveloping black covers, with fiery red 
at their edges. As the wings were forming, two two wire tails form 
on his back and quickly became covered with an armoured layer of 
scales. The two tails, which have a sharp knife ending of energon, 
can be combined to make on larger type energon sword in robot mode. 

The Energon sphere is begining to become diffuse, and transparent, 
all it's energy used up...

ooC: Take it away Mr Smith. =p


--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> Galvatron seemed almost screwed over. Literally, and his eyes 
showed it as 
> Megatron powered up his gun. The betrayal of Empath had left him 
vulnerable. 
> This Megatron was not worthy of such a kill. The jewel on his 
chest powered 
> up as much as it could with the distraction of Empath's powers. It 
would have 
> been enough to keep him from being annihilated but escape would 
have been his 
> only option. Then the light came. From the blip he had felt from 
Megatron's 
> body. It engulfed him and Megatron. He suddenly felt his body 
dissolve. His 
> spark being the only thing remaining. He  saw Megatron's body do 
the same. 
> There sparks both engulfed by this artifacts light that was now 
spinning 
> in-between the spark. He felt a new shell being formed around the 
two sparks. 
> For the first time..Galvatron was afraid.
